pli-tv-bu-vb-sk44:1.3.1: According to [Sp.2.620]() this means repeatedly lifting a mouthful. Since the following rule refers to breaking pieces off a ball of food, this rule may refer to biting repeatedly into the same ball of food.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk44:1.11: _Khajjaka_. According to [Sp.2.615]() this refers to all non-staple foods: _Ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṁ gahetabbaṁ_, “Here the non-staple foods which are roots, etc. may all be taken.”
